ComicInfo.Summary: Over a decade after Terminal, the residents of San Francisco are living a peaceful and prosperous existence thanks to the Program. Every resident is hand-selected and implanted with the chip called Secura. This chip removes the human capacity for violence to maintain the greater good. Only the city's security forces are allowed a brief reprieve from Secura with the help of the drug Freestone in order to do their jobs.Only now there are rumors of Freestone getting out into the open market and it can threaten to upset the delicate balance keeping humanity from extinction.
